name: 菲谢尔
title: Prinzessin der Verurteilung!

cv.japanese: 内田真礼 & 増谷康紀

description: A mysterious girl who calls herself "Prinzessin der Verurteilung" and travels with a night raven named Oz.

talents.name: Normal Attack: Bolts of Downfall
talents.description:
### Normal Attack Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.
``` ``` ### Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, the dark lightning spirits of Immernachtreich shall heed the call of their Prinzessin and indwell the enchanted arrowhead. When fully indwelt, the Rachsüchtig Blitz shall deal immense Electro DMG.
``` ``` ### Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Nightrider
talents.description:
Summons Oz. The night raven forged of darkness and lightning descends upon the land, dealing Electro DMG in a small AoE. For the ability's duration, Oz will continuously attack nearby opponents with Freikugel.
``` ``` Hold to adjust the location Oz will be summoned to. Press again any time during the ability's duration to once again summon him to Fischl's side.
``` ``` *"My time is most precious, and I shall not waste it on the likes of you... Go, Oz, fall upon them, and bring down upon them your Rachsüchtig Blitz, that which tears open the long night."* *—Flowers for Princess Fischl (IV): Farewell Frau Welt*

talents.name: Midnight Phantasmagoria
talents.description:
Summons Oz to spread his twin wings of twilight and defend Fischl. Has the following properties during the ability's duration: - Fischl takes on Oz's form, greatly increasing her Movement Speed. - Strikes nearby opponents with lightning, dealing Electro DMG to opponents she comes into contact with. Each opponent can only be struck once. - Once this ability's effects end, Oz will remain on the battlefield and attack his Prinzessin's foes. If Oz is already on the field, then this will reset the duration of his presence.
``` ``` *"...In the hordes of beasts that follow the cursed blood, only Prince Nachtraben, who bore witness to the extinction of a thousand worlds, knows her true greatness. Thus the night wings he spreads are his eternal promise to protect Her Royal Highness."* *—Flowers for Princess Fischl (I): End Time Zersetzung*

passives.name: Stellar Predator
passives.description: When Fischl hits Oz with a fully-charged Aimed Shot, Oz brings down Thundering Retribution, dealing AoE Electro DMG equal to 152.7% of the arrow's DMG.

passives.name: Undone Be Thy Sinful Hex
passives.description: If your current active character triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction when Oz is on the field, the opponent shall be stricken with Thundering Retribution, dealing Electro DMG equal to 80% of Fischl's ATK.

passives.name: Mein Hausgarten
passives.description: When dispatched on an expedition in Mondstadt, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellations.name: Gaze of the Deep
constellations.description: Even when Oz is not present in combat, he can still watch over Fischl through his raven eyes. When Fischl performs a Normal Attack against an opponent, Oz fires a joint attack, dealing DMG equal to 22% of Fischl's ATK.

constellations.name: Devourer of All Sins
constellations.description: When Nightrider is used, it deals an additional 200% ATK as DMG, and its AoE is increased by 50%.

constellations.name: Wings of Nightmare
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Nightrider by 3.

Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Her Pilgrimage of Bleak
constellations.description:
When Midnight Phantasmagoria is used, it deals 222% of ATK as Electro DMG to surrounding opponents.

When the skill duration ends, Fischl regenerates 20% of her HP.

constellations.name: Against the Fleeing Light
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Midnight Phantasmagoria by 3.

Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Evernight Raven
constellations.description: Extends the duration of Oz's presence on the field by 2s. Additionally, Oz performs joint attacks with your active character when present, dealing 30% of Fischl's ATK as Electro DMG.
